div.p: This code system http://phr.kanta.fi/fiphr-cs-moderatetovigorouspa defines the following codes:

tr.td: Daily Moderate to Vigorous Physical Activity in minutes
Daily moderate to vigorous physical activity, min
Päivittäinen kohtuullisen ja raskaan liikunnan määrä minuutteina
Måttlig eller hård aktivitet per dag, minuter

title.value: Code System Finnish PHR Moderate to Vigorous Physical Activity Fitness Observation Code

description.value: Finnish PHR Fitness Codesystem, that defines the code used for daily minutes of moderate to vigorous physical activity. Will be replaced with LOINC system code when available.

display.value: Daily Moderate to Vigorous Physical Activity in minutes

value.value: Päivittäinen kohtuullisen ja raskaan liikunnan määrä minuutteina
Måttlig eller hård aktivitet per dag, minuter
Daily moderate to vigorous physical activity, min
